Name: Farma Force
About the game: Protect the patient's life and earn money. Hordes of bacteria, germs and parasites will try to break through the defenses. Give them a hard fight. Protect the approaches to the vital organs of a person, withstand several attacks using 10 types of cool weapons with the possibility of their improvements. Farma Force is a 2D tower defense strategy game. You play for the side of the immune system that fights against various diseases that enter your body. Organize the protection of the body from ailments and save the most valuable thing for everyone - health! Game features: - many levels with increasing difficulty - a large selection of defensive structures - lingering puzzles
